name: Wigwam Merino Lite Hiker Socks (2 Pack) - Unisex
description: Stay comfortable from trailhead to lookout and back again. Versatile merino wool socks with light cushioning for long days on the trail.Soft merino wool, nylon, polyester, Tencel and spandex wicks moisture for all comfort.Cushioned sole gives a luxurious underfoot feel.Seamless toe closure contruction ensures chafe-free comfort.
